original_text: Jesus replied, ‘You people today still do not believe in God. I have been with you for a long time and still you do not believe. It is difficult for me to be patient with you. Bring the boy to me.’
korean_text: 대답하여 이르시되 믿음이 없는 세대여 내가 얼마나 너희와 함께 있으며 얼마나 너희에게 참으리요 그를 내게로 데려오라 하시매

sentences.original_text: 'You people today still do not believe in God
sentences.korean_translation: 오늘날 너희 사람들은 여전히 하나님을 믿지 않는다

sentences.original_text: I have been with you for a long time
and still you do not believe
It is difficult for me to be patient with you
